website_summaries.verdict: With a pure white finish, this floating desk will fit in a wide variety of rooms and design styles. Extremely versatile in use and placement.
pros: Stands out for its built-in cable management and organization
Extra shelving provides more space than the average floating desk
cons: Limited space on the included shelves

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new desk. It's the perfect size and fits in any room nicely while saving space and looking great as well. It took a little while to put together and hang (It's heavy) but other than that I couldn't be more happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to assemble! You need 3 people unless you are a carpenter! The instruction sheet is worthless,and you basically have to figure it out yourself! The product is excellent and strong and once you give in the 3 hours to set it up it’s finally worth it
customer_reviews.author: MOSES Moshe

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Bought this for my son to do homework and play his video games on. This is a much better option than installing a full desk. However, assembly and installation requires a 3 out 5 for handiness.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk
customer_reviews.text: This is nice desk, the color perfect match my room, Have little hard time when i assembly it, be attention for the high, needs adjusted before assembly, but works well, and i love the style , save a lot of room, and very good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great desk with enough space for all your needs. I love that it doesn’t take that much space and hanging on the wall. It was easy to put together. You should make a little research prior hanging it, though. Measure accurately where to hang it to fit appropriately your height.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Super practical for tight space
customer_reviews.text: I am super pleased with the desk, not only was it easy to set up, but I am surprised by how solid it feels on the wall, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: nicholas bowman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this desk. It was easy to put together and looks amazing!! Sturdy construction and plenty of desk top space. ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy it
customer_reviews.text: I just edit my review. Because, it is an faulty,non-conforming and bed qulity product. I assembled this wall table 2 weeks ago. I was happy and everything looked perfect . This illusion only last 2weeks. The one of screw hole in the wood!!!cracked! This is not stable anymore. not safety and tumbledown. Fortunately ,I found this thing before bed thing happen. I can't imagine if the table fall down. So crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Kriena Chan

customer_reviews.title: Screws & mount aren't strong enough
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were pretty straightforward, the desk itself seems pretty sturdy & aesthetically pleasing. But the mount was cheap & I wouldn't trust it to hold such weight. Not to mention the screws that you're supposed to use to mount it to the wall. They were by far the flimsiest. The heads broke off the screw inside the wall ( hence, the desk sitting on the floor in the pic). Have to buy a solid piece of wood & have it cut & new screws. Would've got 5 stars if it wasnt for the mount & screws that I need to buy from lowes.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Use bigger screws
customer_reviews.text: Great for small offices or apartments. I would recommend you use larger screws if not drilling direct into studs. The first night it fell and pulled the screws out of the wall. I had larger drywall screws and was able to remount no problem. Overall works and looks great but keep those issues in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Lorne Parks

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy product... wires hide nicely. Easy to hang on the wall. Perfect for Mac. I did some research and found the HP desk jet 3755 wireless printer that’s also scans and prints wirelessly from my iPhone fits perfectly when the paper is removed... I’d highly suggest that printer.... very happy with my purchase and set up
customer_reviews.author: Kwags

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This wall desk is absolutely wonderful, installation is very simple and convenient, the distance of partition can adjust oneself, in order to satisfy the need that places different article, also satisfy me the habit that I stand office, woodiness is very good, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Winston

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this product to friends who have children
customer_reviews.text: This table was bought for my 8 year old son who was still in elementary school. He told me that he liked the table that looked like a new style that could be nailed to the wall. It seems to save space. There is also enough space on the table to put the books he likes and the toy models he likes.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: A very astonishing desk to install.
customer_reviews.text: The wall mounted desk is a very strong result. It helps me with making more rooms for me to put other object the couldn’t be sticked up on the wall to be placed in the bottom of it. The desk has a great quality and Instead of installing a full desk, it would be much easy to install a desk that wouldn’t take much space. This is why I would recommend you to buy this desk. To conclude this comment, this product will be a very useful item.
customer_reviews.author: Karen  Zmh

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: The desk itself was simple to put together. Mounting it wasn't extremely difficult and the finished product worked out well. I used for my daughter's PC and she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Very easy
customer_reviews.text: I usually take a long time to put things together but this was easy peasy. The hardest part was finding the studs in the wall but that had nothing to do with the product. After that, the desk was sturdy and beautiful. I liked it so much I ordered another for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tamie

customer_reviews.title: Very Stable on The Wall
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome! I bought this convenient wall mounted table for my younger sisters birthday gift. She loves it very much! It was easy to assemble. Only need four screws on the back. Then It’s gonna be very stable on the wall. Price is reasonable compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: FZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This desk is very sturdy and worth the money. The assembly wasn't that hard until the last finishing pieces had to be put together but overall a good item
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Rook

customer_reviews.title: This table is what I looking for!
customer_reviews.text: My Chinatown ‘s apartment is small and my bedroom is tiny. I have been looking for a right size office tables for so long . Until I found this table ! I like the floating design save my space . It s easy to assemble and the white colors look good . I did use my own dry wall screws to hold it on my wall ,Cause I wan it stronger . I believe that in my new school year term, I will very happy to use this table !
customer_reviews.author: William G

customer_reviews.title: Simplifying the Kids play room
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! Super easy to put together, very functional! We are working on decluttering our home and this works well for us. Simplifying my girls play room. Will add pics soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dennis

customer_reviews.title: It is great for an apartment because it saves space.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the desk had more space to write. Overall I really like the desk and it fits great in an apartment because it doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chineese Knockoff
customer_reviews.text: The unit I received did not come with instructions. On top of that it is obviously. There is clear damage where screws were put in and taken out. The unit is smeared with dirt/grease, it looks like somebody did a half-hearted wipe before shoving it back into the box. I had to reach out to the company to get the instructions and the graphics are stolen from IKEA's instructions. Just buy the real thing and don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W.

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice desk, but unfortunately too big for the space I had. It is extremely heavy for a wall-mounted desk. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: G.B.A.

customer_reviews.title: Needs better support
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m coming here to write a review is because after about three weeks of installing this desk it fell on my son, he was basically holding it with his legs and hands and its quite heavy for a 9 year old, apart from also having to try to hold the computer screen from falling.. its a nice looking desk mount but requires more support to avoid from falling.
customer_reviews.author: William olvera

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk!!
customer_reviews.text: This desk is awesome! Easy to install and very sturdy. Looks fabulous in newly redone room for teen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! Can tell it’s cheaply made with fiber board. I hope it holds up. I really like the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Heuer

customer_reviews.title: But overall it works great. Just be sure not to mount it too ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a little tricky putting together. Definitely a 2 person job. But overall it works great. Just be sure not to mount it too high.
customer_reviews.author: Xander R.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This desk saving so much space. It comes with a huge box and the quality is good. Looks very pretty on my wall with my white stool.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to assemble and saves a lot of space. We all love it, it makes our room looks much nicer than before.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetie

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: This desk is amazing! It's definitely a room saver. Putting it together was ok but the piece you put on the wall to hang it to isn't that great of quality but it is holding.
customer_reviews.author: James Michael

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. The manual to how to assemble was written out great!! Super easy. I’m extremely happy with this desk!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: It is solid and compact, and floats above the floor
customer_reviews.text: The desk is solid and and was reasonably easy to assemble and mount. The appearance is a bit compromised by all the resets for the necessary fasteners. This issue can be alleviated by the provided adhesive stickers or by adding trim.
customer_reviews.author: gunn prag

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful. Very easy to install. You can put good stuff. I can put my favorite toy car. And. My computer. You can do your homework on it. It brings me a lot of convenience. I'm so happy to have this. Computer desk. Especially the white ones. I am very fond of
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy, my son has a small bedroom but needed a space to use. I was very pleased with the quality and packing. I put it together myself in about half an hour. My husband drilled it to the wall. I'm so pleased with it .Shelves plus holes to feed wires.
customer_reviews.author: Naniel Tarantino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy easy installation.While the assembly was like furniture tables (if you haven't assembled anything for table it's an exercise like no other!), the finished product was PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Little Chip 3.5-4 stars ovrall.
customer_reviews.text: It takes a good 20-30 minute to assemble and i had a noticeable scratch in the corner, the material is a little cheap but since it’s a wall desk the leg room is great. Rated overall 3.5-4 Stars only because of the chip in the corner, otherwise above average for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Scythed

customer_reviews.title: Came crashing out of the wall.
customer_reviews.text: Well it looked great for the 3 weeks it was on the wall. Then it came crashing out of the wall. Luckily nobody was hurt. We made sure it was anchored into a stud but it was still to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and efficient
customer_reviews.text: The was a small mistake with the assembly instructions, however I was impressed with swift response to my issues and fast communication with the correct instructions for assembly!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Allen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Had two corners chipped, nut im going to paint them.
customer_reviews.author: OSVALDO L GIUSTI

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Well built for price. Easy to assemble. Need two people to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality desk!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install if you have a little patience and are thorough. Wife loves it
customer_reviews.author: Emilio nunez

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with instructions to put together but it was not too hard
customer_reviews.author: brad boswell

customer_reviews.title: Not Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very cheaply made. Assembly is tricky but doable. The particle board chips as you are trying to put it together. (We purchased the white one) One piece didn’t have the holes predrilled so that was tricky as well. Vanity covers for screw holes are just stickers!! Not very satisfied at all but now that it is assembled I guess we are stuck!
customer_reviews.author: Liza J. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Instructions to assemble are the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love- this came out better and cuter than I expected. Saves a lot of space. Took some time to assemble but directions are very clear and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika King

customer_reviews.title: surprise product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product .Easy install on the wall . Good
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it, I have more space on my room, and is perfect to study.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, space friendly and well made. Perfect little work desk.
customer_reviews.author: AlyWil

customer_reviews.title: Good desk but limited right side desk space ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good wall desk. I had another with similar features that i like better because this one has the compartments on the left. I’m right handed so that turns out to be a bit annoying. I sit on the right side to center the screen so i have little space on the right for the mouse and my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: just got this wall mount desk, so excited to assemble them, looks very nice once open the box, the wood, the material, every things looks very nice to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kmomoda

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept but didn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: With the instructions you can put it together pretty well. However, it only lasted on the wall less than 20 minutes before it fell off the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: save space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk for my kid. The desk is easy to install and u can select different high for the shelves. another point that i like is this desk has no stand. we have large space when desk is not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Albee

customer_reviews.title: Great for minialists
customer_reviews.text: Quality is nice but dimensions are limited. Wish the shelves were more accommodating.
customer_reviews.author: salmmon

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as i would like especially hope the money. However it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: MythicalQueen

customer_reviews.title: Peeling from the corner
customer_reviews.text: Do like this desk but it has started to peel up on the corners and we just got it for Christmas. Only had it for a month.
customer_reviews.author: wendi jordan

product_meta.title: WLIVE Wall Mounted Desk with Storage Shelves, Computer Table for Home, Office, Stable and Durable Floating Kitchen & Dining Desk, White
feature_bullets: The floating desk needs to be installed on a solid concrete wall or brick wall to make it stable enough. It cannot be installed on a hollow wall or foam wall
Side compartment with 2 adjustable shelves store books, photos and other items
Hiden cable and wire management keeps your desk organized
Overall dimensions: 40.5"W x 19.7"D x 39.4"H. Weight capacity: 100 lbs
Easy to assemble and please mount it at any height to make you more convenient and save your space. 1 year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars130 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
